author: Jason L
title: while n NY we stayed in the Roosevelt hotel
text:
The Roosevelt Hotel is very old and in its day would have been a really lovely hotel, it appears to be in the middle of being upgraded, ie new lifts being installed and the rooms being updated. Our room was a bit small,had recently been updated, we were on the 14th floor,but close enough to Times Square, to make walking for me with my bad legs ok.
Room Tip: We were at the front and i think since we were on he 14th floor , we could hear sirens but no other... See more room tips
